explains: adj. 匿名的，不知名的；无个性的；无脸面的

sentences.en: Ordinary people are at the mercy of faceless bureaucrats.
sentences.cn: 普通人任由千人一面的官僚们摆布。

sentences.en: The company was full of faceless grey men who all looked the same.
sentences.cn: 公司里全是些缺乏个性、毫无吸引力的男人。

sentences.en: "Freedom itself was attacked this morning by a faceless coward," he began, then spoke for two minutes before leaving the room.
sentences.cn: “今天早晨，自由被一个无名懦夫袭击了。” 以此作为开始，他做了两分钟的讲话，随后离开了会议室。
